title.native: 冰剣の魔術師が世界を統べる
title.romaji: Hyouken no Majutsushi ga Sekai wo Suberu
title.english: The Iceblade Sorcerer Shall Rule the World

description:
The Arnold Academy of Sorcery for society’s most elite has just received their first commoner student: Ray White. Despite the contempt he’s received, Ray’s managed to befriend an eclectic group of classmates that get him into all sorts of schemes. But the pressures of maneuvering teenage drama is half his worries, as he secretly is the most powerful sorcerer…the Iceblade Sorcerer!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Fitness
tags.description: Centers around exercise with the aim of improving physical health.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Class Struggle
tags.description: Contains conflict born between the different social classes. Generally between an dominant elite and a suffering oppressed group.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Cult
tags.description: Features a social group with unorthodox religious, spiritual, or philosophical beliefs and practices.

node.description:
**Alma Mater:** Liverpool Institute for Performing Arts (BA Music)

[Website](https://tatsumusic.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tatsu_saiki) | [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/tatsuyan)

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Website](http://uchidamaaya.jp/) | [Profile](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=26) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/maaya_taso) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/uchidamaayataso/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJFEXIRB6DP_2FQJzv7pbXg)

Maaya Uchida is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer who works for I'm Enterprise. She is [Yuuma Uchida](https://anilist.co/staff/119617/)'s older sister.

**Awards:**
- She won the Best New Actress Award at the 8th Seiyuu Awards, for her role as [Hajime Ichinose](https://anilist.co/character/85153/).

**Non anime roles:**
- [Fischl](https://anilist.co/character/209685/Fischl) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- [Ichihime](https://anilist.co/character/200348/Ichihime) - Mahjong Soul (VG)
- Pure Vanilla Cookie - Cookie Run: Kingdom (VG)
- Admi - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Epinel - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Ms. NewBabel - Reverse: 1999 (VG)
- Gretel - SINoAlice (VG)
- Sakura - Shinobi Nightmare (VG)
- Kanami - Strinova (VG)
- S-Sha - Megadimension Neptunia VII (VG)
- Zero - Drakengard 3 (VG)
- Hiroyo Hakase - Hikōnin Sentai Akibaranger (Super Sentai)
